resources.string: Invalid wifi details, please check your inputs.
Cannot download photo list from camera!
Please enter the wifi details from your camera below.\nYou can locate them by going to Menu > Setup > Wireless LAN Setting > Communication Info.
It seems that it\'s taking a long time to connect to the camera. Please check that the camera is turned on and that WiFi is enabled. You can also force a connection retry.
The system is limiting the amount of WiFi scans we can perform. The app will automatically retry the connection once possible.
